item.description:
Since this is both a hiking and adventurers group, I have decided to set up a meet up with some adventure in it. Tonight we will be meeting at Canobie Lake Park in Salem, New Hampshire to enjoy a little bit of Halloween frights at their Spooky World set up. The price of general admission is $22.99. We will be meeting at 7:00 P.M. at the ticket office (if anybody knows of a better location such as a McDonalds, convience store, etc. nearby that would be more convenient and I will notify people). I will be wearing a yellow baseball cap and a black down vest.

Please note that costumes are not allowed.

Please visit the WEB Site for additonal information.

This promises to be a most interesting night........ Be prepared to be scared!!
item.how_to_find_us: DIANNE AND I WILL BE IN A BLACK FOUR DOOR ECHO WITH MAINE PLATES
item.name: SPOOKY WORLD AT CANOBIE LAKE PARK
